nodes.text: The Hole was an establishment located in a seedy part of Coruscant's underworld. It was situated next to Enmonst Rclub. A luminous Aurebesh sign spelled out the name of the business. During the Clone Wars, bounty hunter Cad Bane stayed in an apartment near The Hole, while planning a mission to break into the Jedi Temple.
During pre-production, The Hole was known as "Bigrock". In the concept art, an Aurebesh sign over the main sign says "lal".
